Ancient One.name: Ancient One
Ancient One.text: [Augment] I have all abilities of adjacent allies. {i}(Abilities include everything below the type line.)
rulings: This copies abilities if it is in formation, meaning it can only function during combat as either an attacker or blocker. It does not work in the precombat or main phases.
If there are two copies of this card next to each other, they would both have all the abilities of any creature adjacent to either of them.
This effect includes modifications such as grafted and augmented abilities.
